meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Yankees Lead Series; Seattle Sweeps Chicago The Yankees beat the Oakland Athletics, 4-2, and now lead their playoff series two games to one. And the Seattle Mariners won, 2-1, eliminating the Chicago White Sox in three straight games.

Yankees Lead Series; Seattle Sweeps Chicago The Yankees beat the Oakland Athletics, 4-2, and now lead their playoff series two games to one. And the Seattle Mariners won, 2-1, eliminating the Chicago White Sox in three straight games.
Battle on Judicial Races Efforts by states to rein in aggressive politicking by judicial candidates are being blocked by judges as unconstitutional.
Hockey Player Sentenced A Canadian judge gave Marty McSorley probation for hitting another player in the head with a stick in an N.H.L. game.
